description: This file defines an Angular component 'ProductListComponent' used to display and manage a list of products. It includes fetching products from a service, handling filters, pagination, and navigation to product details.

classes.name: ProductListComponent
classes.description: Angular component for displaying and managing a list of products with filtering, pagination, and navigation functionalities.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook to initialize component and fetch the initial product list.

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Fetches products from the ProductService based on current filters and pagination.

methods.name: applyFilters
methods.description: Applies current filter values and refreshes the product list.

methods.name: clearFilters
methods.description: Resets filter values and refreshes the product list.

methods.name: prevPage
methods.description: Navigates to the previous page of the product list if possible.

methods.name: nextPage
methods.description: Navigates to the next page of the product list if possible.

methods.name: openDetail
methods.description: Navigates to the product detail page for a specific product.
